content.prompt: The data can best be used to support which of the following claims about the mechanism for regulating ferritin gene expression?

choices.label: Iron increases ribosome binding to ferritin mRNA.
Iron causes the ferritin mRNA to be degraded.
Iron increases the effect of actinomycin D on RNA polymerase.
Iron decreases the ability of ferritin mRNA to bind to ribosomes.

skill.text: 6.B: Support a claim with evidence from biological principles, concepts, processes, and data.
